# GitHub Topics

## Suggested Topics for This Repository

Add these topics to your GitHub repository to improve discoverability:

### Core Technologies
- `ffmpeg` - FFmpeg-based media processing
- `golang` - Written in Go
- `go` - Go programming language
- `docker` - Docker deployment ready
- `rest-api` - RESTful API interface

### Functionality
- `video-processing` - Video processing capabilities
- `audio-processing` - Audio processing capabilities
- `media-processing` - General media processing
- `media-pipeline` - Media processing pipeline
- `transcoding` - Media transcoding

### Architecture & Patterns
- `declarative` - Declarative API design
- `dag` - Directed Acyclic Graph processing
- `workflow` - Workflow orchestration
- `job-queue` - Job queue processing
- `microservices` - Microservices architecture

### Use Cases
- `video-editing` - Video editing capabilities
- `video-converter` - Video format conversion
- `streaming` - Media streaming support

## How to Add Topics

1. Go to your GitHub repository page
2. Click on the gear icon (⚙️) next to "About" on the right sidebar
3. In the "Topics" field, add the suggested topics above
4. Click "Save changes"

## Visual Preview

Topics will appear as clickable tags below your repository description, making it easier for users to discover your project when searching for related technologies.
